https://tmrev.io/movie/31715-A Huey P. Newton Story 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/pBL79QqhOnmZJvhvt3mSkPXaSfB.jpg A Huey P. Newton Story is a 2001 film directed by Spike Lee. It is a filmed performance of Roger Guenveur Smith's one-man show of the same name. Smith sits in a chair on a stage and tells about the past, mostly dealing with Huey P. Newton's life and times. A Huey P. Newton Story
